Class EvalbByCat

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Eval

    public class EvalbByCat
extends AbstractEval
    Computes labeled precision and recall (evalb) at the constituent category level.
    Author:
    Roger Levy, Spence Green
